message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. This is the minimum I'm willing to sell it for, and I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. I think this is a fair price considering the value I can get out of it.

I understand that $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for it. I think this is a fair price considering the value I can get out of it.
